name: data.world & MWS Connector
description: Pulls data from your Amazon MWS account and pushes it to a data.world dataset

ALL_ORDERS_FILENAME.description: Name of the file for the All Orders Report, e.g. AmazonAllOrders.csv

CUSTOMER_RETURNS_FILENAME.description: Name of the file for the FBA Returns Report, e.g. AmazonFBAFulfillmentCustomerReturns.csv

START_DATE.description: How far back to pull data. Format: 2017-01-01

MWS_MARKETPLACE_IDS.description: Marketplace IDs you're registered to sell in. Can be a single value or a comma-separated list: ATVPDKIKX0DER,A2EUQ1WTGCTBG2

MWS_ACCESS_KEY.description: The Access Key that you received when you registered for Amazon MWS

MWS_SECRET_KEY.description: The Secret Key that you received when you registered for Amazon MWS

MWS_SELLER_ID.description: The seller identifier that you received when you registered for Amazon MWS

MWS_AUTH_TOKEN.description: The authorization token that you received when you registered for Amazon MWS
